com.ohtu.wearable.wearabledataservice.sensors

Class JSONConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ohtu.wearable.wearabledataservice.sensors.JSONConverter

  • public class JSONConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that converts native sensor value from java array format to JSON-format

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.json.JSONObject convertSensorListToJSON(java.util.List<android.hardware.Sensor> sensorList)
      Converts list of sensor objects to readable JSON format
      static org.json.JSONObject convertToDatabaseJSON(SensorUnit unit)
      Add SensorUnit data to database Currently converts SensorUnits name as a string and double[] data as JSONObject to a JSONObject, which is saved to the database.

      Converts input float[] to JSONObject

        public static org.json.JSONObject convertSensorListToJSON(java.util.List<android.hardware.Sensor> sensorList)
                                                   throws org.json.JSONException
        Converts list of sensor objects to readable JSON format
        Parameters:
        sensorList - List of Sensor-objects
        Returns:
        JSONObject containing information of all if any sensors given in the list

        org.json.JSONException

      • convertToDatabaseJSON

        public static org.json.JSONObject convertToDatabaseJSON(SensorUnit unit)
        Add SensorUnit data to database Currently converts SensorUnits name as a string and double[] data as JSONObject to a JSONObject, which is saved to the database.
